org.ndeftools.wellknown
Class TextRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.ndeftools.Record
      org.ndeftools.wellknown.TextRecord

public class TextRecord
extends Record

Well-known text record.

Contains text, locale and string encoding. To be used as a lightweight, general purpose text field with support for internationalization and language information.

Author:
Adrian Stabiszewski (as@nfctools.org)
